topComments.comment: Tranquilo, organizado, lugar para relaxar e brincar um pouco.

topComments.author: Eduardo Dias
topComments.comment: Melhor Parque Aqu√°tico de Miami

topComments.author: Zafar Razzacki
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Grande parque aqu√°tico que √© divertido para todas as idades. Nossos filhos adoravam brincar na "piscina de emojis" descendo os escorregadores e, especialmente, quando a casquinha de sorvete despejava √°gua a cada poucos minutos. A √°rea de estar ao redor da piscina principal √© √≥tima, com prestativos funcion√°rios que trazem toalhas e preparam suas cadeiras. Eles tamb√©m t√™m servi√ßo de comida / bebida com uma boa variedade de op√ß√µes no menu. O rio lento √© uma maneira bastante simples e tranquila de se deitar e relaxar. E os grandes slides s√£o empolgantes para os ca√ßadores de emo√ß√£o na fam√≠lia. No geral, n√≥s apreciamos nossos poucos dias de sair ao sol e brincar na piscina.  (Original) Great water park that is fun for all ages. Our kids loved playing at the "emoji pool" going down the slides and especially when the ice cream cone dumps water every few minutes. The seating area around the main pool is great, with helpful service people that bring towels and prep your chairs. They also have food/drink service with good variety of options on the menu. The lazy river is a pretty simple and uneventful way to lay back and relax. And the big slides are exciting for the thrill seekers in the family. Overall, we enjoyed our few days of hanging out in the sun and playing in the pool.

topComments.author: Shirley Perez Anel
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) O parque aqu√°tico √© lindo e tem muita divers√£o. Eu amo a √°rea de surf e o rio lento. Ele est√° localizado perto do shopping de Aventura, o que representa uma √≥tima op√ß√£o de estacionamento devido ao alto custo do estacionamento do hotel. √â um lugar muito movimentado e √†s vezes √© dif√≠cil encontrar uma cadeira, mas a equipe far√° todos os esfor√ßos para acomod√°-lo. A equipe √© muito eficiente, com excelentes habilidades de servi√ßo. O ambiente √© bom. A comida √© ok, mas n√£o h√° muitas op√ß√µes. O pre√ßo √© alto em compara√ß√£o com restaurantes pr√≥ximos. Todas as bebidas custam mais de US $ 18, com uma apresenta√ß√£o n√£o muito boa. A salada √© mais de $ 30 e n√£o muito boa. No geral √© bom para a primeira experi√™ncia, mas n√£o tenho certeza se √© uma boa op√ß√£o para repetir uma visita  (Original) The waterpark is beautiful and has a lot of  fun. I love the surfing area and the lazy river. It is located near Aventura's mall which represents a great choice for parking since the expensiveness of the hotel parking. It is a very busy place and sometimes is difficult to find a chair, but the staff will make every effort to accommodate you.  The staff is very efficient, with excellent service skills. The ambience is good. The food is ok, but there is not many choices. The price is high compared to near by restaurants. Every drinks is over $18, with not that good presentation . The salad is over $30 and not that great. Overall is good for first time experience, but not sure if a good choice to repeat a visit

topComments.author: Sandeep Wilkhu
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Excelente resort, o servi√ßo √© excepcional. Vamos pessoal e abastecido resort. Tivemos um fim de semana super divertido aqui.  (Original) Excellent resort, service is exceptional. We‚Äôll staffed and stocked resort. We had an super fun weekend here.

topComments.author: Gloria Campuzano
topComments.comment: Fun water park if planning to stay at the hotel, not just to come for the water park. Get get more Alie for your money at Rapids, it is a much bigger parkand way more rides. The lazy river is fun, but gets crowded.

topComments.author: Almira Rise
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) N√≥s fomos l√° hoje com 2 crian√ßas pequenas, o parque aqu√°tico estava bem, muito lotado. Comida era muito muito ruim. Pedimos hamb√∫rguer infantil, hamb√∫rguer vegano e asas de frango Buffalos. Os hamb√∫rgueres estavam extremamente queimados, muito escuros e era imposs√≠vel comer. Pagamos US$ 140 pela pior refei√ß√£o de nossas vidas.  (Original) We went there today with 2 little kids, aqua park was fine, very crowded. Food was very very very bad. We ordered Kid‚Äôs burger, Vegan burger and Buffalos chicken wings. Burgers were extremely burned, very dark and it was impossible to eat. We paid $140 for the worst meal in our lives.

topComments.author: Sandro Rivera
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) N√£o v√° l√° se voc√™ n√£o √© o tipo deles. Nunca me senti t√£o discriminada na minha vida! Meu filho de 3 anos e eu fomos recusados ‚Äã‚Äãdevido ao evento de P√ÅSCOA. Ent√£o, basicamente, se voc√™ n√£o fosse judeu ou se hospedasse no hotel deles, voc√™ pagaria US$ 500 por pessoa. Eu estava disposto a pagar US$ 55 por pessoa sem nenhum problema. Meu filho estava chorando muito, mas gra√ßas a Deus h√° um Chuck E Cheese por perto. Nunca vou pensar em voltar a este lugar.  (Original) Don't go there if you aren't their kind. I've never felt so discriminated in my life!  My 3yr old and I were turned away due to PASSOVER event. So basically,  if you weren't Jewish or staying at their hotel you were to pay $500 per person. I was willing to pay $55 per person with no problem.  My son was crying his lil head off, but thank God there's a Chuck E Cheese near by. Never will I ever think to go back to this place.

topComments.author: Jeremy D. Boyd
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Embora n√£o haja um n√∫mero enorme de escorregadores, este √© possivelmente o parque aqu√°tico mais bonito que j√° estive. Sim, os pre√ßos s√£o caros para a admiss√£o, mas mant√©m o riff riff fora. Definitivamente, vale a pena separar-se desse p√∫blico. Com isso dito, realmente um grande momento.  (Original) Although there aren‚Äôt a tremendous number of slides this is quite possibly the nicest all around water park I‚Äôve been to. Yes the prices are expensive for admission but it keeps the riff raff out. Definitely worth the break from that audience. With that said, a great time indeed.

topComments.author: Jessie Wilkie
topComments.comment: Chad, our cabana server, was extremely attentive. The food and drinks were delicious and were served to us fairly quickly. The waterpark staff was extremely focused on safety. They closed the attractions promptly when lightening was in the area, and our server was STILL attentive to us throughout the entire time. The lifeguards were very knowledgeable and attentive to anyone who needed their assistance. Jeff, Director of Waterpark also came by to check on us twice. The cabana was clean, the rides were super fun, and my family and I had a great time! FIVE STAR EXPERIENCE, and I can‚Äôt wait to come back!

topComments.author: Frederick Samuel
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Muito Amazing Family Staycation! Pelo √≥timo servi√ßo √† excelente comida. Servi√ßo amig√°vel e r√°pido. Atmosfera divertida. √ìtimo DJ no fim de semana. Bons coquet√©is. Tivemos um grande momento!!  (Original) Very Amazing Family Staycation! For the Great service to the excellent food. Friendly, fast service. Fun atmosphere. Great DJ on the weekend. Good cocktails. We had a great time!!

topComments.author: Alvaro Gutierrez
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Muita divers√£o - h√° muito mais para fazer (e mais para andar) do que se esperaria, devido ao seu tamanho aparente e localiza√ß√£o central.  (Original) A ton of fun - there's significantly more to do (and more to ride) than one would expect given its apparent size and central location.

topComments.author: Natasha Chipiga
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Ficamos no hotel Turnberry e nossa experi√™ncia no Tidal Cove foi fant√°stica!!! Principalmente gra√ßas a Ricardo como nosso atendente de piscina. Ficamos l√° por 3 dias e nos 2 dias em que nos sentamos em sua se√ß√£o, fomos tratados como VIP! ! Ele nos trouxe gelo, ele mudou nossas espregui√ßadeiras a cada 2 horas para sempre garantir que estiv√©ssemos na sombra. Ketchup sem fim para as crian√ßas. O nome dele, ele pensou nisso. Ele nos fez sentir como celebridades!! Kenny foi a equipe de gar√ßons e ele cuidou muito de n√≥s tamb√©m. Quando voltarmos, queremos apenas sentar na se√ß√£o deles. Super acolhedor super simp√°tico gra√ßas a Ricardo e Kenny.  (Original) We stayed at the Turnberry hotel and Our experience at Tidal Cove was fantastic!!! Mostly thanks to Ricardo as our pool attendant. We were there for 3 days and the 2 days we sat in his section we were treated like VIP!! He brought us ice, he moved our lounge chairs every 2 hours to always ensure we were in the shade.  Endless ketchup for the kids. You name it, he thought of it. He made us feel like celebrities!! Kenny was the wait staff and he took great care of us also. When we return we only want to sit in their section. Super accommodating  super nice thanks to Ricardo and Kenny.

topComments.author: Adrienne Marzano
topComments.comment: Jeff Mikus and his team were beyond exceptional. They were very accommodating and always looking out to make sure we were happy throughout the day.  We had a great day at tidal cove with everyone having so much fun! Excellent customer service& an excellent water park!

topComments.author: Manuel Rivera
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Viemos com nossa fam√≠lia para passar o fim de semana e realmente passamos o tempo de nossas vidas. Tanto Masha, nossa gar√ßonete, quanto Jeff Mikus, fizeram cada minuto parecer especial para todos n√≥s e nossos amigos e familiares. O lugar, como de costume, foi espetacular e um atendimento ao cliente √∫nico. Ansiosos para a nossa pr√≥xima escapadela de fim de semana na enseada das mar√©s  (Original) We came in with our family to spend the weekend and truly spent the time of our lives. Both Masha our waitress and Jeff Mikus made every minute feel special for all of us and our friend and family. The place as usual was spectacular and one of a kind customer service. Look forward to our next weekend getaway at the tidal cove

topComments.author: Jocelyn Ventura
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Incr√≠vel üëè a gente se diverte aqui, o quarto t√£o limpo, o atendimento √© mesmo üëç, s√≥ o pessoal precisa ser mais simp√°tico quando fala com os clientes  (Original) Amazing üëè we have a good time here ,the room so clean, the service is really üëç, only the staff need be more friendly  when talk with the clients

topComments.author: Marleen Vatne
topComments.comment: Jeff Mikus and his team were amazing when we went to celebrate my sons birthday. They were so kind and helped to accommodate all our needs while we were there. The water park is great for kids and adults. I highly recommend going!

topComments.author: Fernando Gonzalez
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) √â um √≥timo lugar para relaxar por conta pr√≥pria e / ou passar bons momentos em fam√≠lia. Os escorregas, o rio lento e as piscinas s√£o todos bem cuidados e n√£o precisam se mexer ou formar uma fila como outras instala√ß√µes semelhantes. A equipe est√° muito atenta √†s suas necessidades, nunca teve que cham√°-las, pois elas sempre estavam por perto. Sylvester foi absolutamente incr√≠vel, muito √∫til com recomenda√ß√µes de alimentos e um √≥timo anfitri√£o. N√≥s realmente apreciamos o qu√£o bom √© o servi√ßo aqui, apreciamos a nossa estadia e certamente voltaremos em breve. Altamente recomendado!!!!  (Original) This is a great place to relax on your own and/or spend some great family time. The slides, lazy river and pools are all well maintained and don't have to scramble or make a line as other similar facilities. Staff is very attentive to your needs, never had to call them as they made sure to always be around. Sylvester was absolutely amazing, very helpful with food recommendations and a great host. We really appreciate how good the service here is, enjoyed our stay and will surely be back soon. Highly recommended!!!!

topComments.author: Miami Cuz
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Estou dando duas estrelas ao Tidal Cove por causa do pre√ßo.  Se voc√™ quiser ir l√° no fim de semana, voc√™ tem que pagar $ 200 por pessoa. Absurdo! O parque aqu√°tico parece legal, mas n√£o por US$ 200 por pessoa. Eu n√£o pagaria mais de US $ 40 por pessoa por este lugar.  Como alternativa, posso gastar US $ 140 no total por pessoa para os dois parques aqu√°ticos da Disney (Blizzard Beach e Typhoon Lagoon), que s√£o muito melhores que o Tidal Cove. O Volcano Bay da Universal, tamb√©m melhor que o Tidal Cove, cobra US$ 70 por pessoa.  O pre√ßo do Tidal Cove √© o c√∫mulo do absurdo. Eu acredito que o pre√ßo √© projetado para manter as pessoas de baixa e m√©dia renda.  (Original) I am giving Tidal Cove two stars because of the pricing.  If you wanted to go there on the weekend, you have to pay $200 per person.  Absurd!  The water park looks kinda cool, but not for $200 per person. I wouldn‚Äôt pay more than $40 per person for this place.  Alternatively, I can spend $140 total per person for both of Disney‚Äôs water parks (Blizzard Beach and Typhoon Lagoon) which are way better than Tidal Cove. Universal‚Äôs Volcano Bay, also better than Tidal Cove, charges $70 per person.  Tidal Cove‚Äôs pricing is the height of absurdity.  I believe the pricing is designed to keep out low and middle income people.
